Function reference

Data sets/importing data

beans
Preferred Bean Varieties in Nicaragua
nascar
Results from 2002 NASCAR Season
pudding
Paired Comparisons of Chocolate Pudding
read.soc() read.soi() read.toc() read.toi() as.aggregated_rankings(<preflib>)
Read Preflib Election Data Files

Handling orderings

complete()
Complete Orderings with the Missing Redundant Rank
decode()
Decode Orderings using a Key to Item Names

Handling rankings

adjacency()
Create an Adjacency Matrix for a set of Rankings
aggregate(<rankings>) as.aggregated_rankings() `[`(<aggregated_rankings>) freq()
Aggregate Rankings
choices()
Choices Object
connectivity()
Check Connectivity of Rankings
group() as.grouped_rankings() `[`(<grouped_rankings>) format(<grouped_rankings>)
Group Rankings
rankings() as.rankings() `[`(<rankings>) format(<rankings>)
Rankings Object

Model Fitting

PlackettLuce()
Fit a Plackett-Luce Model
pladmm()
Fit a Plackett-Luce Model with Linear Predictor for Log-worth
pltree()
Plackett-Luce Trees

Model Summary

coef(<PlackettLuce>) summary(<PlackettLuce>) vcov(<PlackettLuce>)
Plackett-Luce Model Summaries
coef(<pltree>) vcov(<pltree>) AIC(<pltree>) predict(<pltree>)
Plackett-Luce Tree Summaries
fitted(<PlackettLuce>) fitted(<pltree>)
Fitted Probabilities for PlackettLuce Objects
itempar(<PlackettLuce>) itempar(<pltree>) itempar(<PLADMM>)
Extract Item Parameters of Plackett-Luce Models
qvcalc(<PlackettLuce>)
Quasi Variances for Model Coefficients

Other

simulate(<PlackettLuce>)
Simulate from PlackettLuce fitted objects

Internal

PlackettLuce-package
Plackett-Luce Models for Rankings
